product_name: Appalachian Mountain Club White Mountains Trail Map - Presidential Range
long_description: This Appalachian Mountain Club trail map lets you explore New Hampshire's Presidential Range armed with the latest information packed into a waterproof package. Map comes in a handy folded size for portability; it's printed on light, waterproof and tear-resistant paper to withstand backcountry treks. 1:42,240-scale map includes mileage data for trail segments; the other side has a detailed map of Mt. Washington with a scale of 1:18,00 along with key hiking information. Map measures 27 by 21.5 in. and folds to 9.75 by 3.75 in. Appalachian Mountain Club; copyright 2012.
short_description: This Appalachian Mountain Club trail map lets you explore New Hampshire's Presidential Range armed with the latest information packed into a waterproof package.
